cyclone.name: FRED
cyclone.current_location: about 160 miles south of Panama City, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving northward across the northeastern Gulf of Mexico toward the western Florida Panhandle, then inland across AL/GA
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: western Florida Panhandle (near Panama City, FL)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Navarre to the Wakulla/Jefferson County line (FL Panhandle)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Storm Surge Warning from Indian Pass to Yankeetown (FL Gulf Coast)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Panhandle and Big Bend coast, extending inland across southeast AL and GA
weather_observation.wind: Brief squally gusts possible; sustained tropical-storm-force winds unlikely (<5% chance).
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for PortMiami; surge confined to Florida Panhandle and Big Bend.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rainbands may bring 1â€“2 inches of additional rain to South Florida through 16 Aug, with localized totals up to 5 inches.
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and rip-current risk along Atlantic beaches.
